sourcesContent:
Questions

Question Wrong Answer 1 Wrong Answer 2 Wrong Answer 3 Correct Answer Category Actions
{{ question.question }} {{ question.wrongAnswer1 }} {{ question.wrongAnswer2 }} {{ question.wrongAnswer3 }} {{ question.correctAnswer }} {{ question.category }}
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-question-page', templateUrl: './question-page.component.html', styleUrls: ['./question-page.component.css'] }) export class QuestionPageComponent implements OnInit { questions: Array = []; categories: Array = []; answers: Array = []; constructor(private http: HttpClient) { } private getAnswerById(answerId: number, answers: Array): string { const answer = answers.find(a => a.id === answerId); return answer ? answer.antwort : ''; } ngOnInit() { const categoriesUrl = 'http://localhost:5002/kategorien'; const questionsUrl = 'http://localhost:5002/fragen'; const answersUrl = 'http://localhost:5002/antworten'; this.http.get>(categoriesUrl).subscribe((categoriesResponse) => { this.categories = categoriesResponse; this.http.get>(questionsUrl).subscribe((questionsResponse) => { this.http.get>(answersUrl).subscribe((answersResponse) => { this.answers = answersResponse; this.questions = questionsResponse.map(question => { const category = this.categories.find(cat => cat.id === question.kategorien_id); const answers = [ this.getAnswerById(question.falscheAntwort1, this.answers), this.getAnswerById(question.falscheAntwort2, this.answers), this.getAnswerById(question.falscheAntwort3, this.answers), this.getAnswerById(question.richtigeAntwort, this.answers), ]; return { ...question, categoryName: category?.name, answers }; }); }); }); }); } }
